General.Name: Flying Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Flying Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of elevator door systems, elevator integrated control systems, elevator cars, and door system supporting components in China. The company was formerly known as Wuxi City Zhan Peng Technology Company Limited. Flying Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
